thread.title: Surfline Launches New Android App Designed To Help Surfers Decide When and Where to Surf
thread.title_full: Surfline Launches New Android App Designed To Help Surfers Decide When and Where to Surf

title: Surfline Launches New Android App Designed To Help Surfers Decide When and Where to Surf
text:
Surfline Launches New Android App Designed To Help Surfers Decide When and Where to Surf ET | Source: Surfline/Wavetrak, Inc. photo-release 
HUNTINGTON BEACH, Calif., Aug. 21,   Available today, Surfline's newly redesigned Android app gives surfers the tools they need to find better waves. Surfline, the world's leader in surf forecasting, surf reports, and HD surf cameras, continues to improve the lives of surfers around the world with the latest release of the Surfline Surf Reports/Forecast app for Android. 
"We're really happy to release a reimagined Surfline experience for our Android users" said Gavin Cooper, director of product at Surfline. "We've made it easier than ever to check the surf at your local surf spots." 
For surfers worldwide, the redesigned app will improve their ability to make the right call when deciding when and where to surf. The new app offers improved stability of live streaming surf cams, as well as a redesigned favorite surf spots at-a-glance view, surf video player upgrade and the ability for users to choose between viewing data such as wave height on the metric or English system. 
You can download the app here for free. The Surfline app for Android is available worldwide. 
The Android app joins Surfline's other offerings for surfers, including an iOS app and website, Surfline.com . Surfline also powers the Nixon Ultratide watch, a Bluetooth-enabled surf watch from Nixon that provides surfers with real-time surf conditions and weather data. Visit Surfline.com for more information. 
About Surfline 
Surfline/Wavetrak, Inc. specializes in providing live and predicted ocean weather information, editorial content, and consulting services to consumers, businesses, and government agencies worldwide. Headquartered in Huntington Beach, California, Surfline/Wavetrak Inc. is focused on enabling its customers to pursue peak surfing, marine, and fishing experiences through the Surfline.com, Buoyweather.com , and FishTrack.com brands on web and mobile platforms. The Company offers paid premium subscription services on both web and mobile platforms. In addition to paid subscriptions, the Company also offers advertising and provides a range of marketing services designed to reach and connect with users of Surfline, Buoyweather, and FishTrack. For more information on Surfline, please visit http://www.surfline.com and check out our Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/surfline . You can follow us on Twitter at: http://www.twitter.com/surfline and Instagram: @surfline. 
A photo accompanying this release is available at: http://www.globenewswire.com/newsroom/prs/?pkgid=35436 Gretchen Wegrich gretchen@surfline.com 1 (800) 229-7873 Related Articles
